amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that individuals residing outside of Puerto Rico shall be eligible to vote in the referenda held under the bill if that individual is a United States citizen because of that individual's birth in Puerto Rico and would be eligible to vote in such referenda but for that individual's residency outside of Puerto Rico.
